Nasreen is a 33-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. In order to support her husband (also shown in the photo) in taking care of the family, she began the business of milk selling. She is known in her town for providing good-quality milk. She owns buffaloes for milking.

She is happily supporting her family with the income generated. She has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to inflate her sales for generating more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to inflate her sales for generating more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Sajida has successfully built her business selling milk with the help Kiva and Kashf Foundation. She has buffaloes for milking purposes. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She has four children. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children.

She has taken many loans from Kashf Foundation. Now, she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR to purchase one more buffalo for increasing milk sales, to earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions to her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo for increasing milk sales, to earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions to her children.

loans.name: Jesus Antonio

texts.es:
Jesus tiene 54 años y es un hombre casado. Vive en el municipio de Caicedo con su esposa y 4 hijos, quienes son su inspiración y el amor de su vida. Por ellos fue que decidió comenzar su propio negocio hace 30 años, una granja donde cultiva gran cantidad de productos. 

El necesita un préstamo para poder comprar abonos para sus cultivos de café. El espera que con este pueda hacer su negocio sostenible y que sus cultivos no solo crezcan sino que mejoren su calidad. El sueña con poder dejar este negocio a sus hijos, pero solo después de que ya sea uno exitoso. 

Ayuda a Jesus con el préstamo que necesita para que él pueda lograr todas sus metas.
texts.en:
Jesus is 54 years old and married. He lives in the town of Caicedo with his wife and 4 children, who are his inspiration and the love of his life. It was for them that he decided to start his own business 30 years ago, a farm where he grows a large quantity of products.

He needs a loan to be able to buy fertilizers for his coffee crops. He hopes that with the loan he can make his business sustainable, and that his crops not only grow, but improve in quality. He dreams of being able to leave this business to his children, but only after it has become a success. Help Jesus with the loan he needs so that he can meet his goals.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his coffee crops.

loans.name: Omar Dario

texts.es:
Omar tiene 20 años y vive en el municipio de San Pedro de Uraba. A pesar de lo joven que es tiene muy claro que es lo que quiere en su vida, por eso dos años atrás decidió comenzar su propio negocio, el cría pollos para luego venderlos, algo que aprendió a hacer gracias a un amigo.

El pide hoy un préstamo que le permita comprar más pollos, alimento para ellos y para realizarle algunas mejoras al galpón. El espera que toda esta inversión le permita mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus clientes, incrementar su utilidad y hacer sostenible su negocio. El sueña con poder pagar la educación de sus hijos.

Omar necesita un poco de ayuda, y puede ser usted quien le colabore, tan solo con un préstamo.
texts.en:
Omar is 20 years old and lives in the town of San Pedro de Uraba. Despite being young, he's very clear about what he wants from his life. For that reason, two years ago he decided to begin his own business. He raises chickens to sell them later, something he learned to do thanks to his friends.

He currently seeks a loan that will allow him to buy more chickens and feed for them, and to make some improvements to the barn. He hopes that all this investment will allow him to better his sales, expand his customers, increase his earnings, and make his business sustainable. He dreams of being able to pay for the education of his children. Omar needs a bit of help, and it can be you who collaborates with him, with just one loan.

loans.use: to buy more chickens and feed for them, and to make some improvements to the barn.

loans.name: Davis Dario

texts.es:
Davis tiene 44 años y vive en el municipio de San Pedro de Uraba. Él tiene 3 hijos a los cuales ama más que su vida y por los cuales trabaja arduamente, para que tengan calidad de vida. Hace 20 años comenzó su propio negocio, el cría cerdos para venderlos luego, un negocio que heredó de su familia.

El pide un préstamo para comprar alimento para sus cerdos, además necesita hacer unas mejoras y ampliación de la cochera. Él quiere que su negocio sea exitoso, mejorar ventas para que aumenten los clientes y las ganancias. Sueña con poder pagar la educación de sus hijos y mejorar las condiciones de su hogar.

Ayude ahora Davis para que cumpla sus objeticos, preste ahora.
texts.en:
Davis is 44 years old and lives in the town of San Pedro de Uraba. He has 3 children whom he loves more than his life and for whom he works hard, so that they have a good quality of life.

Twenty years ago he began his own business. He raises pigs to sell later, a business he inherited from his family. He seeks a loan to buy feed for his pigs. He also needs to make some improvements to and enlarge his pigsty. He wants his business to be successful, and to improve his sales so that his customers and his profits increase. He dreams of being able to pay for the education of his children and to improve the conditions of his home. Help Davis now so that the can meet his objectives. Lend now.

loans.use: to buy feed for his pigs; he also needs to make some improvements to and enlarge his pigsty.

loans.name: Maximo Eliseo

texts.es:
Maximo vive en San Pedro de Uraba y tiene un negocio de cría de cerdos, trabajo que le ha permitido sostener a su familia y salir adelante. Quiere ser más competitivo en el mercado, mejorar sus ventas y aumentar sus clientes. Sueña con pagar la educación de sus hijos y comprar una vivienda para su familia.

Pide un préstamo para construir un tanque para el agua de los cerdos para que se alimenten mejor.
texts.en: Maximo lives in San Pedro de Uraba and he has a business raising pigs, work that has allowed him to sustain his family and to get ahead. He wants to be more competitive in the market, improve his sales and increase his clientele. He dreams of paying for the education of his children and purchasing a home for his family. He is asking for a loan to construct a tank for water for the pigs so that they can be better nurtured.

loans.use: to construct a tank for water for the pigs so that they can be better nurtured.

loans.name: San Rafael Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama San Rafael  está en su ciclo número 5 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan para salir adelante, ellas se fijaron como meta el crecimiento de sus condiciones de vida, para poder ayudar a sus familias, dándoles un mejor porvenir.
La Sra. Geronima es una de las integrantes de este grupo, ella se dedica a las ventas de productos de primera necesidad, es una mujer muy trabajadora que con sacrificio y esfuerzo se ha ganado la vida. Ella desea poder seguir mejorando su humilde emprendimiento para poder dar a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de productos de primera necesidad, agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar y crecer en su emprendimiento.
texts.en:
This group is called San Rafael. It is in its 5th cycle of the committee of women program, where all work and help each other to get ahead. They chose as their goal the improvement of their quality of life, to be able to help their families, providing them a better future.

Geronima is one of the members of this group. She works selling staple goods. She is a very hardworking woman who with sacrifice and effort has made a living. She wants to be able to continue improving her humble business in order to give her family everything she couldn't have. She seeks this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of staple goods. She is grateful for the the opportunity she is receiving to be able to improve and grow in her endeavor.

loans.use: to buy staple goods for sale.

loans.name: Witley

texts.es:
Witley tiene 21 años y vive en el municipio de San Pedro de Uraba. Él tiene una moto con la que presta un servicio de transporte a las demás personas. Lo comenzó por necesidad económica y espera poder con el tiempo incrementar las ganancias y que sea sostenible. Sueña con Pagar la educación de sus hijos y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.

Pide un préstamo para compra de una nueva moto y poder actualizar los papeles de la que ya posee.
texts.en: Witley is 21 years old. He lives in the town of San Pedro de Uraba. He has a motorcycle that he uses to provide transportation services to other people. He began this work out of economic necessity and he hopes, with time, to be able to increase his earnings and to make it sustainable. He dreams of paying for the education of his children and improving the condition of his home. He is asking for a loan to complete the purchase of a new motorcycle and to be able to complete the papers for the one that he already has.

loans.use: to puchase a new motorcycle and to be able to complete the paperwork for the one that he already has.

loans.name: Angel De La Guarda Group

texts.es:
El comité de mujeres Angel de la Guarda está en su primer ciclo, ellas se unieron para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos por medio del trabajo en equipo.
Una de las integrantes que se destaca es la Sra. Marciana, una mujer muy sacrificada que por medio de sus ventas de comidas se gana la vida de una manera digna y honesta. Ella quiere seguir creciendo, y es por ello que pone todo de si para poder seguir creciendo.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para hacer sus comidas, como ser: verduras, carne, condimentos, hortalizas, panificados y otros, de manera a seguir deleitando sus clientes con sus platillos.
texts.en:
The group of women, Angel de la Guarda, is in their first cycle. They meet in order to improve their living conditions, and those of their loved ones, through their work as a team.

One of the members who is standing is Marciana, a woman who sacrifices a lot through her sales of food to make a living in a dignified and honest way. Marciana wants to continue growing her business and it is because of this that she puts everything into being able to continue growing.

She asked for this loan in order to purchase supplies for making her food, such as: greens, meat, condiments, vegetables, baked goods and others so she can continue delighting her customers with her dishes.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make food, such as: greens, meat, condiments, vegetables, baked goods and others.

loans.name: Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Oñondivepa está en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas estan haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 2 integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir en una situación de pobreza extrema.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Teodosia quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de la venta de ropas que hace, se gana la vida de una manera digna y honesta. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que pone todo de sí para poder mejorar y crecer en su emprendimiento.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas variadas, como remeras, camisas, pantalones, polleras y otros, y así seguir cumpliendo con el pedido de sus clientes. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The group called Oñondivepa is in the 3rd cycle of the committee of women program, where all are participating in the elimination of poverty scale. Two of the members are below the poverty line, which is a situation of extreme poverty.

One of the members is Teodosia, who through her effort and continuous work, and through her sales of clothing, makes a living in a dignified and honest manner. She is a very hardworking person who gives her all in order to be able to improve and grow her endeavor. She seeks this loan to be able to invest in the purchase of various garments, such as jerseys, shirts, pants and skirts, among other things, so that she can continue meeting the demand of her customers. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy garments to sell, such as jerseys, shirts, pants and skirts, among others.

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
La señora Gladis de 62 años  de edad es casada,   vive con sus  dos nietos y su madre  en su casa de habitación, se dedica desde hace 18 años al negocio de venta de abarrotería, su negocio está ubicado en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras.
Doña Gladis en su negocio vende todo lo relacionado a la canasta familiar, también vende comidas, frescos, sopas de mondongo, tortillas para baleadas y agua en bolsa, es una mujer trabajadora y muy emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante, vende de todo y gracias a su actividad ha podido sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Doña Gladis está solicitando el préstamo para compra de abarrotería como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, huevos, queso, harina, aceite, café, etc. también quiere comprar gallinas y cerdos para poder elaborar tamales para la época navideña con el apoyo del préstamo pretende mejorar su ingreso y salir adelante, está muy contenta de solicitar su quinto préstamo. Uno de sus sueños es mejorar su negocio y su casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre del 2015.
texts.en:
Mrs Gladis is 62 years old, married and lives with her two grandchildren and her mother in her house. She has made a living for the past 18 years in the business of grocery sales. Her business is located in a community in San Lorenzo which is in southern Honduras. Mrs Gladis sells everything related to the family basket, and also ready meals, soft drinks, vegetable soup, tortillas for baleadas and bottled water. She is a hardworking and very entrepreneurial woman with desires of moving forward. Thanks to her hard work she has provided well for her children. Mrs Gladis is asking for a loan to buy groceries such as rice, sugar, beans, eggs, cheese, flour, oil, coffee etc. She also wants to buy chickens and pork to be able to make tamales for the Christmas season. With the help of the loan, she intends to improve her income and move forward. She is very happy to request her fifth loan, and dreams of improving her business and her house.


San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2015.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, eggs, cheese, flour, oil, and coffee etc for her business.

loans.name: Manantial Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Manantial es un comité donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están trabajando dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Nayda  es la presidenta del grupo quien comenta que siempre trata de ayudar a sus compañeras en todo lo que pueda. Ella es comerciante, es decir se dedica a la venta de ropas de forma particular, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace tiempo por tal motivo tiene clientela, ya que le conocen en la zona, esto le genera ingresos para ella y su familia. Su esposo también trabaja, y así ambos ayudan al sostenimiento de su familia. 
Ella pide este préstamo para la compra de más prendas de vestir de temporada para abastecer su clientela, lo que también le ayudara a captar más clientes y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The Manantial group is a committee in which everyone works and helps one another get ahead. They are working within the poverty elimination program, struggling to improve their own quality of life and that of their families.

One of the members is Nayda. She is the president of the group, and remarks that she always tries to help her colleagues however she can. She is a businesswoman. She works selling clothes in a specific manner. She has done this work for some time, so that she has a customer base, as she is known in the area. It generates income for her and her family. Her husband also works, and they both help support the family. She seeks this loan to buy more seasonal items of clothing, to provide for her customers, which will also help her gain more customers and improve her earnings.

loans.use: to buy seasonal items of clothing.

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru: Шахноза очень рада за Вашу доброту. Она успешно погасила предыдущий кредит. В свои 27 лет она умелая рукодельница. Шить одежды ее научила  соседка. По ее словам, ей нравится этим заниматься. Шахноза зарабатывает деньги, реализуя свои швейные изделия. Она благодарно соседке за то, чно она научила ее этой ремесло.  Шахноза зарабатывает и поможет мужу обеспечить семью. Она просит кредит для реомнта дома, чтобы улучшить жилищные условия семьи. За счет кредита она купит стройматериалы. Шахноза в будущем мечтаеть стать талантливой и известной рукодельницей.
texts.en: Shahnoza is grateful for your kindness. She has successfully repaid her previous loan. At 27 years old, she is a skillful needlewoman. Her neighbor taught het to sew. She enjoys doing it. Shahnoza makes her living by selling the ready-made garments. She is grateful to her neighbor for teaching her how to saw. Now Shahnoza can make money and help her husband provide for their family. She requested a loan to renovate their house and improve the living conditions. She with use the loan to buy construction supplies. Shahnoza Is dreaming of becoming a talented and renowned needlewoman.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies

loans.name: Wilson

texts.es:
Wilson con 30 años de edad, de estado civil casado,vive en casa propia de material rústico,junto a su esposa y su menor hija,en el distrito de Santo Tomás,provincia de Cutervo,departamento de Cajamarca,país Perú. El cuenta con muy buenas referencias tanto personales como laborales por parte de los moradores de la zona. Los habitantes de esta localidad se dedican en su mayoría a la agricultura,comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica la cría y comercialización de ganado vacuno,con una experiencia en el rubro desde hace 08 años,su ganado lo comercializa los días domingo en la plaza de ganado vacuno en el distrito de Santo Tomas de Cutervo, donde se reúnen criadores, compradores de todo el distrito y sus caseríos para ofertar el ganado que posee cliente. Adicionalmente se dedica a la construcción siendo ayudante de construcción de obra.El destino del crédito será para invertir en la compra y sanidad de ganado vacuno. De esta manera obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.

Wilson es socio recurrente para Edpyme Alternativa.El firma con aval.
texts.en:
Wilson is 30 years old. He is married and lives in his own home built of rustic materials along with his wife and young daughter. They live in the Santo Tomás district in the province of Cutervo, in the department of Cajamarca, Peru.

Both his personal and professional references from area inhabitants are very good. Most people in the area work in agriculture, business and livestock. He raises and sells cattle, and has had experience doing this for 8 years.

He markets his cattle on Sundays in the livestock plaza in the Santo Tomas de Cutervo district, where breeders and buyers from throughout the district and its villages come to bid on the cattle.

In addition he works in construction helping build buildings. The loan will be to invest in the purchase of cattle and in their care. This way he will earn better income and improve his quality of life.

Wilson is a recurrent member with Edpyme Alternativa. He is signing with a guarantor.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase and care of cattle.

loans.name: Aracelly

texts.es:
Aracelly es una campesina humilde y trabajadora de 47 años de edad, que desde pequeña aprendió todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de su padre.
Actualmente posee cultivos de hortalizas, cuyas cosechas son recolectadas y vendidas en el mercado del pueblo donde reside, esto le genera los recursos suficientes para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar y solventar las necesidades básicas de su familia.
Se motiva a solicitar el crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas al por mayor (abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes), esto le permitirá seguir cuidando de sus cultivos y mejorar la productividad de la próxima cosecha, lo que beneficiará los ingresos que percibe por cada venta.
Aracelly manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir luchando para generar una estabilidad económica y brindar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y bienestar.
El cultivo de Aracelly Podrá mantenerse y salir adelante con tu ayuda!
texts.en:
Aracelly is a humble and hardworking, 47 year old farmer. From a young age she learned all the jobs in the fields, thanks to the instruction of her father. Currently she has crops of vegetables, whose harvests are collected and sold in the market of the village where she lives. This generates sufficient resources to meet the daily needs of her home and to take care of the basic needs of her family.

She was motivated to seek a loan with the goal of investing it in the purchase of agricultural supplies wholesale (manure, pesticides and fertilizers). This will permit her to continue caring for her crops and will improve the productivity of the next harvest, which in turn will benefit the earnings realized from each sale. Arecelly states that her greatest desire is to continue fighting to generate economic stability and provide her family a better quality of life and wellbeing. The crop of Aracelly can be maintained and she can move forward with your help!

loans.use: buy agricultural supplies wholesale (manure, pesticides and fertilizers).

loans.name: Darwin Andres

texts.es: Darwin tiene 32 años de edad, de estado civil soltero tiene una hija Antonela de 6 años de edad estudia en una unidad educativa del sector, hace tres años inicio su negocio vendiendo ropa de una forma ambulante. Darwin necesita el dinero para adquirir mercadería, surtir su negocio así obtendría mayores ingresos para poder pagar la alimentación y educación de su pequeña niña, a futuro sueña con tener una casa propia.
texts.en:
Darwin is 32 years old. His civil status is single. He has a 6-year-old daughter, Antonela, who goes to a school in the sector.

Three years ago he began his business of selling clothes as a street vendor. Darwin needs the money to acquire merchandise to stock his business. Thus he would obtain greater income to be able to pay for food and education for his little girl.

In the future he dreams of having his own house.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: La Alegria Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama La Alegría está en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde ellas se unieron para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus familias.
La Sra. Mirian, una de las integrantes pide este préstamo para  poder comprar insumos de primera necesidad para la venta, para que de esa forma pueda seguir esforzándose por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo y mejorando cada día a través de su trabajo.
texts.en:
The group called "La Alegría" is in their third loan cycle with the Women's Committee where they get together in order to be able to improve their living conditions and those of their families.

One of the members Mirian, is requesting this loan to be able to buy basic food products to sell. In this way she can continue to make an effort to improve her living conditions

She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to continue to grow and improve each day through her work.

loans.use: to buy basic food products to sell.

loans.name: Dora Alicia

texts.es:
Dora vive su esposo de 48 años de edad y sus hijos de 10 y 15 años de edad, su negocio consiste en  vender tamales y pupusas, todos los días vende tamales, la venta de pupusas es ciertos días, también por temporadas elabora riguas, el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa, esta actividad le permite aportar con los gastos de su hogar.
Invertirá en aceite, maíz, harina, tomates, aderezos, bebidas, gas propano, entre otros ingredientes básicos para preparar la venta de tamales, pupusas y riguas, abastecerá su inventario para trabajar por un largo tiempo, además podrá atender a sus clientes de una mejor manera, con la ayuda del crédito espera tener mayores ventas y ganancias para seguir cumpliendo con sus obligaciones.
Sus sueños son resarcir su deuda, darles a sus hijos mejores oportunidades de desarrollo y seguir apoyando a su esposo con los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Dora lives with her husband who is 48 years old and her children who are 10 and 15 years old. Her business consists of selling tamales and pupusas (stuffed tortillas). She sells tamales every day, pupusas on certain days and, in some seasons, she also makes riguas (Salvadoran cakes made from corn). She runs her business from her home. Having her business allows her to help with the household expenses.

She will invest in cooking oil, corn, flour, tomatoes, seasonings, drinks, propane gas and other basic ingredients to prepare tamales, pupusas and riguas. She will stock up her inventory in order to work for a long period of time. This will also allow her to better serve her clients. With the help of this loan, she hopes to increase her sales and earnings to continue meeting her obligations.

Her dreams are to repay her debt, give her children better opportunities for growth, and continue to help her husband with the family expenses.

loans.use: to invest in basic ingredients and propane oil to make tamales, pupusas and riguas.

loans.name: Cesar Ernesto

texts.es:
César, solicita un nuevo crédito para poderlo invertir en la compra de golosinas como lo son boquitas, sodas, pan dulce, etc., y de esa manera poder incrementar su inventario para satisfacer las necesidades que tengan sus clientes.
Con el crédito anterior César pudo mejorar su negocio, ya que atrajo más clientes y sus ingresos fueron notorios  eso le permitió poder mejorar su situación económica y poderle dar una mejor calidad de  vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar is asking for a new loan to invest in the purchase of snacks, soft drinks, bread, sweets, etc. in order to be able to increase his inventory to satisfy the needs of his clients.

With his previous loan, Cesar was able to improve his business. He attracted more clients and his earnings were notable. This allowed him to improve his economic situation and provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy snacks, soft drinks, bread, sweets, etc. to increase his inventory.

loans.name: Carlos Gilberto

texts.es:
Carlos es un joven de veinte y ocho años de edad, es muy trabajador, desde pequeño descubrió su vocación para la panadería, en la actualidad tiene un negocio de venta ambulante de postres y panes. Gracias a un primer préstamo que le brindo MiCrédito junto a Kiva, logro crecer notablemente como comerciante, por lo cual él se encuentra muy agradecido y confía ciegamente en ambas organizaciones. 
Esta temporada es clave para Carlos, su demanda ha incrementado grandemente pero tiene la dificultad para trasladar sus productos, por eso ha decidido pedir un financiamiento Kiva junto a MiCrédito para comprar una motocicleta, lo que hara fluir sus entregas y mantendrá a sus clientes más satisfechos. En un futuro desea obtener otro financiamiento para actualizar la maquinaria que utiliza en su panadería.
texts.en:
Carlos is a young man who is 28 years old and is very hardworking. At a young age, he discovered that his vocation was baking. He currently has a business selling desserts and bread as a traveling salesperson. Thanks to his first Kiva loan from MiCredito, he was able to grow considerably as a businessman for which he is very grateful and completely trusts both organizations.

This time of year is very important for Carlos and his demand has increased significantly. But, he has a hard time being able to move his products. This is why he has decided to request a Kiva loan, through MiCredito, to purchase a motorcycle which will ease his deliveries and keep his clients satisfied. In the future, he hopes to obtain another loan to update the equipment he uses in his bakery.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
El comité se encuentra, en su primer ciclo, donde todas ponen su mayor esfuerzo para poder salir adelante. Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Claudia quien se dedica a la venta de ropas nuevas, ella es el soporte de su familia y siempre trata de ser el ejemplo para su comité.
Claudia es una mujer muy trabajadora, que se destaca por ser una mujer muy que pese a los desafíos del día a día pone su mayor esfuerzo para lograrlo.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas variadas para la venta, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas, cumpliendo con la demanda de sus clientes y luchando por mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
The communal bank is in it's first loan cycle and all of it's members put forth their best effort in order to succeed. One of the members of the group is Claudia who works selling new clothing. She is the one who supports her family and she always tries to be an example for the group.

Claudia is a very hardworking woman who stands out for being a woman who, despite the day to day challenges, puts forth her best effort to succeed.

She is asking for this loan to purchase articles of clothing to sell in order to continue with her sales, meet the demand of her clients, and fight to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy various articles of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose es estudiante de la carrera de administración de empresas, es una persona muy luchadora, que con sacrificio y esfuerzo está esforzándose por poder cumplir sus anhelos.
Él a la par que estudia también está trabajando para poder cubrir sus gastos de la universidad y de esa forma poder ser un profesional útil para la sociedad.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Jose is a business administration student. He is a very tenacious person, and with sacrifice and effort he is striving to be able to achieve his ambitions. 

At the same time that Jose is studying, he is also working so that he can cover his university expenses, and because of this, he will be able to be a useful professional in society. 

Jose is asking for this loan to be able to pay tuition and fees for his course of study, so that he will be able to continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay university tuition and fees.

loans.name: Timoteo Bolivar

texts.es: Timoteo  tiene 45 años de edad vive en unión libre,su conviviente realiza manualidades para ayudar a su esposo, tienen 3 hijos Marlon de 16 años, Julián de 10 y Maykerly de 6  años de edad ellos estudian en unidades educativas del sector, trabaja muy duro vende alfombras,caminando y llevando en su espalda los productos recorre los diferentes pueblos y ciudades manifiesta que es mucho más fácil llegar al cliente mediante la venta ambulante que esperar en un local que vaya a comprar. Timoteo  con el dinero comprara mercadería, mesas de centro, alfombras espera vender en esta temporada más productos, obtener mayores ganancias para seguir cubriendo las necesidades básicas de sus familias a futuro desea tener una motocicleta para continuar con su negocio.
texts.en:
Timoteo is 45 years years old and is in a common-law relationship. His spouse makes handicrafts to help her husband. They have three children, Marlon is 16 years old, Julián is 10 and Maykerly is 6. They study in schools in their area.

He works very hard selling rugs, walking and carrying the products on his back, traveling around the different towns and cities. He claims that it is much easier to find a client through itinerant sales than waiting for them to come to you in a shop to buy.

With the money Timoteo will buy merchandise, coffee tables and rugs. He hopes to sell more products in this season, obtaining greater profit to continue to cover the family's basic necessities. In the future he would like to have a motorcycle to continue with his business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, coffee tables and rugs.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
César, se dedica a la venta de productos plásticos y artículos de primera necesidad, él cuenta con 70 años de edad y vive con su hija que tiene 23 años de edad, su esposa ya falleció; él se dedica a la venta de estos productos desde hace 5 años y lo hace como manera de sobrevivencia ya que no recibe ayuda de ningún familiar.
Con el crédito invertirá en la compra de artículos de primera necesidad y además de bolsas plásticas para su comercio, con esta inversión el busca incrementar su inventario y de esa manera poder obtener más ingresos.
El sueño de César es poder fortalecer su negocio y poderle ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar has a business selling plastic products and basic consumer goods.  He is 70 years old, and he lives with his 23 year-old daughter.  His wife is deceased.  Cesar has been selling these products for 5 years, and he does this to survive because he does not receive help from any relatives.

With this loan, he will invest in basic consumer goods and plastic bags for his business.  With this investment, he seeks to increase his inventory and generate more income.

Cesar's dream is to fortify his business so that he can offer a better quality of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy products and plastic bags for his business

loans.name: Sonia Amparo

texts.es: Sonia tiene 55 años de edad está casada su esposo trabaja como  estibador, viven con su nieto John de 15 años de edad, estudia en una unidad educativa del sector,  hace 15 años inicio su pequeño negocio luego de ser lavandera de ropa,en época navideña se dedica a vender en una de las calles más transcurridas  figuras plásticas, en cerámica o en caucho con las que se prepara el pesebre, fundas navideñas algunos regalos y caramelos con el dinero que obtiene puede ayudar a su esposo con la alimentación,  el pago del lugar donde viven. Sonia comprara con el dinero mercancía, surtirá su pequeño negocio obteniendo así mayores ingresos para ayudar en los gastos básicos de su hogar.
texts.en:
Sonia is 55 years old and is married. Her husband works as a stevedore. They live with their grandson John who is 15 years old and attends the local school. Fifteen years ago, she started her own small business after being a laundress.

In the Christmas season she works on one of the busiest streets, selling plastic, ceramic and rubber figurines for nativity sets, Christmas bags, some gifts and sweets. With the money she earns, she is able to help her husband buy food and pay for the place where they live.

With the loan, Sonia will buy merchandise to stock her small business in order to increase her earnings and help with the basic household expenses.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her small business.

loans.name: Famille Mavuma Group

texts.fr: C'est depuis 1985 qu'Oredie s'est lancé dans la riziculture à partir l'apprentissage qu'il a reçu de ses parents. Il confirme que cette activité participe à la survie de la famille. Il se plaint de l'insuffisance de fonds propres pour cultiver des meilleurs espaces et parvenir à répondre aux exigences de la culture. Il compte se mettre au travail, avec son épouse, en agrandissant leur espace cultural afin d'améliorer le rendement et ainsi les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Oredie took up rice growing in 1985, from the training that he received from his parents. He confirms that this work contributes to the family's survival. He complains that his own funds are insufficient to farm better areas and manage to meet the farming requirements. He hopes to get to work, with his wife, by expanding their farming area in order to improve the yield and thus his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to fund a second plowing, transplantation, harrowing, payment for phytosanitary products and labour.

loans.name: Miski Ñawi Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MISKI ÑAWI” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal German Busch, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Mónica es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, venta de frutas, venta de chalecos, venta de colchas, venta de celulares, venta de gorras. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Mónica es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de su prima que es clienta de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de chalecos; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió por iniciativa propia hace varios años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de chalecos por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella aún es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y la capacitación que ofrece la institución.

En al foto también aparece la esposa del señor Elvis, es la señora con chompa de color negro.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Miski Ñawi" will begin its first cycle with Pro Mujer, part of the Centro Focal German Busch. It is made up of eight members and is led by a board with Mónica as president. The businesses of the members are varied and include food sales, fruit sales, vest sales, quilt sales, cellular phone sales, and hat sales.

The loan they are seeking will benefit micro-entrepreneurs such as Mónica. This is her first time as a member of Pro Mujer - she was invited to join by her cousin who is a client of the institution. Currently, she has a business selling vests which she learned on her own many years ago.

This loan will be used to increase her capital by buying vests from wholesalers in the city of El Alto and then selling them from her sales stand. This will allow her to generate the means to support her family, as she is a single mother of two children.

Mónica likes the health care and training offered at the Pro Mujer institution.

(The wife of group member Elvis also appears in the photo. She is the woman in the black sweater.)

loans.use: buy vests at wholesale.

loans.name: Famille Mihigo Yope Group

texts.fr: Pour ses deux hectares à exploiter, Mihigo sollicite un crédit qui lui permettra de réaliser des travaux d'entretien. Riziculteur depuis l'an 2000, deux ans seulement après la deuxième guerre qui a sévi la région, la misère était telle qu'il a décidé avec son épouse de se donner à l'agriculture afin de subvenir aux besoins de leur famille. Cela a eu comme conséquence, l'amélioration de son habitat et l'acquisition de deux champs de deux hectares chacun. Malgré que l'exploitation de cette étendue demande plus de moyens qu'il en a, il souhaite dans l'avenir atteindre 5 hectares afin de répondre favorablement aux charges familiales et de scolariser ses enfants jusqu'au niveau universitaire.
texts.en: For the two hectares that he operates, Mihigo asks for a loan that will allow him to carry out maintenance works. He has been a rice grower since 2000, only two years after the second war that hit the region. The misery was such that he decided with his wife to devote themselves to agriculture in order to meet their family's needs. As a result, his housing improved and he acquired two fields of two hectares each. Even though the farming of this area requires more means than he has, he wishes in future, to gain 5 hectares in order to respond favorably to the family burdens and to send his children to school, through to university level.

loans.use: to harrow.

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es:
Blanca, de 43 años de edad, es madre adoptiva de una joven quien ya se independizo y formo su propia familia, está casada y por razones personales se separo recientemente de su esposo, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de terneros, de esa manera cubre las necesidades de su hogar y apoya económicamente a una amiga que vive con ella. 

Blanca, tiene un año y  medio de dedicarse a la compra y venta de terneros, ella compra los terneros en las cercanías de la comunidad y las comercializa en el tiangue los días sábados, este negocio lo aprendió de su esposo; pero aparte de eso los días de semana ella se dedica a atender sus cultivos y los oficios domésticos. 

Blanca, necesita el préstamo para comprar más terneros para comercializarlos, a traves de este negocio espera poder obtener muy buenos ingresos e incrementar su volumen de venta y con ello quiere poder gozar de una diferente calidad de vida. 

Blanca, sueña con tener mejores ingresos y espera que su volumen de venta incremente y así ayudar a su hija y ampliar su vivienda porque donde actualmente vive es bien pequeño; todo eso espera hacerlo por medio del crédito que solicita.
texts.en:
Blanca is 43 years old and is the adoptive mother of a young woman who has since become independent and started her own family. She is married, and for personal reasons, has recently separated from her husband. She works buying and selling calves. This is how she is able to cover the costs of her household necessities and economically support a friend who is living with her.

Blanca has worked buying and selling calves for a year and a half. She buys the calves in the area surrounding the community and sells them in the small market on Saturdays. She learned this trade from her husband. Aside from this, she works tending to her crops and taking care of the household chores during the week.

Blanca needs a loan to buy more calves to sell. Through this business, she hopes to earn a good income and increase her sales volume. With this, she wants to be able to enjoy a different quality of life.

Blanca dreams of having a greater income and hopes that her sales volume will increase in order to help her daughter and enlarge her home because where she currently lives is very small. She hopes to do all of this with the loan she is requesting.

loans.use: to buy more calves to sell.

loans.name: Candelaria Nohemi

texts.es:
Candelaria es una mujer de veinte y nueve años de edad muy trabajadora y esforzada, en compañía de su esposo ha logrado sacar adelante su pulpería, Ella está profundamente agradecida con MiCrédito y Kiva, porque ambas organizaciones ya le han brindado un préstamo con el cual logro abastecer su negocio de productos con los que no contaba.
Dada la temporada navideña, es indispensable para Candelaria mantener su negocio completo es por eso que necesita comprar productos enlatados, carnes, sazonadores, verduras, bebidas, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, entre otros, dado que son los que más se venden, por eso ella ha decidido tocar una vez más las puertas de ambas organizaciones para que se le otorgue un nuevo financiamiento. En un futuro desea poder obtener otro financiamiento que planea invertir en la comprar de exhibidores más grandes y freezeres.
texts.en:
Candelaria is a 29-year-old woman who is very hardworking and dedicated. Accompanied by her husband, she has been able to succeed with her grocery store. She is profoundly grateful for MiCredito and Kiva because both organizations have provided her with a loan with which she was able to stock her business with products that she did not have.

Given that it is the Christmas season, it is essential for Candelaria to keep her business well-stocked. This is why she needs to buy canned goods, meat, seasonings, vegetables, drinks, rice, beans, sugar and other products given that they are the products she sells the most. This is why she has decided to approach both organizations again to receive a new loan. In the future, she hopes to receive another loan which she plans to invest in the purchase of bigger display cases and freezers.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, meat, seasonings, vegetables, drinks, rice, beans, sugar and other products.

loans.name: José Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto, de 50 años de edad, es comerciante, tiene tres hijos, está casado y actualmente solo uno de ellos vive en su casa y estudio hasta tercer grado.

Humberto, tiene negocio propio, se dedica a la venta de panes, papitas, minutas y desde hace poco tiempo también tiene venta de ropa americana usada, mientras su esposa es quien le apoya por las tardes a la venta  de los productos alimenticios, el negocio de ropa lo tiene en su casa y esto le permite tener varios negocios a la misma vez y el día domingo sale a vender a las comunidades cercanas. 

Humberto, necesita el préstamo para comprar más ropa para vender, porque el dinero que tenía disponible lo utilizó para mejorar el techo de su vivienda, porque estaba en mal estado y se mojaba la mercadería.

Humberto, sueña con crecer cada vez en el negocio y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Humberto, 50, is a businessman who has three children and is married. Only one of them currently lives at home and he studied until the third grade.

Humberto has his own business selling bread, potato chips, and shaved ice, and recently he also began selling used clothing from the U.S. His wife supports him in the afternoons selling food products. He has the clothing business in his house, which allows him to run several businesses at the same time. On Sundays, he goes out to make sales in nearby communities.

Humberto needs this loan to buy more clothing to sell. He used the money he had available to improve the roof on his house, because it was in poor condition and the merchandise was getting wet.

Humberto dreams of continued business growth and improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell.

loans.name: Famille Muluba Group

texts.fr: Depuis 2010, Jovial et sa famille pratiquait la culture du riz pour la subsistance. Après le constat que la commercialisation du produit était intéressante, il s'est rallié aux autres pour accroitre sa production. Comme effet, cette activité a supporté l'achat d'une parcelle, la scolarisation des enfants, les soins de santé et tant d'autres charges. Jovial est confronté au problème de fonds pour matérialiser ses travaux qu'il estime trouver réponse grâce aux crédits PAIDEK. Au cours de la saison précédente, pour ses 40 ares cultivés, il a réalisé un gain de trois cent soixante-cinq dollars sur une production de six cents dollars. Il trouve que ce gain est insignifiant face aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Since 2010, Jovial and his family practice rice growing for subsistence farming. After the analysis that the commercialization of the product was of interest, he joined with others to increase his production. As a result, this work supported the purchase of a piece of land, his children's schooling, healthcare and many other expenses.  Jovial is confronted with a funding problem in order to realise his works, for which he thinks to find an solution through the PAIDEK loans. During the last season, for the 40 100 square metres of farming, he carried out a profit of three hundred and sixty five dollars on a production of six hundred dollars. He finds that this profit is insignificant facing his family's needs.

loans.use: to finance all the works from the harrowing up to the harvest.

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en: Rufina is a married woman with one dependent. She is 54 years old and is a farmer working in the town of San Miguel, Bohol. She and her husband own and till the land where they grow rice crops. They also operate a sari-sari (general) store. Rufina has requested a loan that she plans to use to purchase soft drinks, canned food, cooking oil, soy sauce, shampoo, candies, chips, detergent, sugar, and seasoning. She is thankful for CEVI's microfinance services, because she is able to take loans when needs arise.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, canned food, cooking oil, soy sauce, shampoo, candies, chips, detergent, sugar, and seasoning.

loans.name: Maura

texts.en:
Maura hails from Dagohoy, Bohol. She is 57 years old and is married with one fifteen-year-old dependent. Together with her husband, she works hard on a farm growing rice for a living.

Maura is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her crops. She wants to increase her income for her family’s welfare. Any additional profit will go towards expansion of her farming business. In the future, she hopes to see her child having a better chance in life with the help of education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer  and pesticides

loans.name: Immaculate's Group

texts.en:
Immaculate is 25 years old and is often described as a very experienced farmer. She has two children and is married. As group leader, Immaculate is representing her group of 14 farmers in Teso District in Kenya, and is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Immaculate's desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Apart from receiving farming inputs, she is also purchasing a solar light as part of her loan, which is very exciting to her as she will now be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits that she gains from this year’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

Immaculate and her group will receive a total of five solar lights as well as input loans of maize and fertilizer to plant a total of eight acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
In 2011 Lucia started farming rice in San Miguel, Bohol. Since then, farming has been her means of helping her husband and providing for her four children aged five, seven, eight and ten. The harvest gave them food to eat as well as income for the family to use.

Lucia is about to start buying, then selling rice from other farmers. Many farmers prefer to sell their harvest to a middleman such as Lucia to save on transportation when delivering their produce to buyers.

To manage this business well, Lucia is asking for a 3,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner CEVI to buy more rice from farmers. It is her dream to expand her business so she can live in abundance through the proceeds of her business.

loans.use: to buy, then sell more rice from farmers.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is a rice farmer from the town of San Miguel, Bohol. This place is quite far from the capital of Bohol--around three hours away from the city. Because of this distance people--like Myrna--living in the area are dependent on agricultural businesses. She has been farming rice for ten years. She also raises hogs.

Myrna is asking for a loan to buy feed for her hogs and pay for her child’s tuition fees. The loan will help her pay her dues on time while waiting for the income that she can generate from her business. Myrna is determined to make her business do well because this is the work that she knows best. In the future, she dreams of having a good life as the result of her business success.

loans.use: to buy feed for her hogs and pay for her child’s tuition fees.

loans.name: Mburucuja Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Mburucuja, están en su ciclo número 30 del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo muy unido que viene trabajando hace varios ciclos, y están luchando y creciendo por poder salir adelante.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ramona, quien se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comidas, que todos los días se levanta a hacer desde muy tempranas horas del día y después las sale a vender de manera ambulante. Ella es una persona que se esfuerza siempre por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser carne, condimentos, hortalizas, panificados y otros, de manera a poder seguir haciendo sus comidas. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
This group is called Mburucuja. They are in their 30th loan cycle in the women's committee program. It is a very united group that has been working for a number of cycles, and they are striving and growing to be able to get ahead.

One of the members is Señora Ramona, who makes and sells food. She gets up every day at a very early hour to make it., and later she goes out to sell it as a street vendor. She is a person who always makes an effort to improve her living conditions and those of her loved ones.

She is requesting this loan to be able to buy supplies to make her foods, such as meat, condiments, vegetables, baked goods, and other items, so that in this way she can continue making her foods. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy supplies to prepare food, such as meat, condiments, vegetables, baked goods, and other items.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбуба успешно закончила ремонт. Она благодарно за Вашу искреннюю поддержку. Махбуба продвигает сое любое дело. Она радуется когда у нее увеличится количество клиентов. Махбуба решила купить мебель для дома, по причине что ее мебель уже постарело, и были советскими. Махбуба с такими планами обратилась за кредитом. Она верит в Вас и на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Mahbuba successfully finished her renovations. She is thankful for your sincere support. She is continuing her beloved career and is happy when her number of customers increases. 

Mahbuba has decided to buy furniture for her house, because her furniture is quite old, from Soviet times. With these plans she is looking for a loan. She trusts in you and your support.

loans.use: to buy furniture

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is 26 years old and happily married. He and his wife have been blessed with one child who is still an infant.

Robert has been a farmer for ten years. He aims to have a plentiful yield this next harvest season, so he has applied for a 20,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner ASKI to buy a bag of rice seed plus pesticides for the continuous development of his crops. He knows that this loan will result in healthier and higher yields and provide a better future for his child.

loans.use: to buy a bag of rice seed plus pesticides for his farm.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.en:
Ruben has been running his farming business for ten years. He is a proud farmer who is married to an overseas Filipino worker. Ruben wants his wife to come home and take care of their three-year-old child.

With his determination to have a better way of life and increase his crop yield, he has been doing his best to keep his rice farmland productive. To reach his goal, Ruben is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000. He will use this loan to buy seeds and other farm inputs needed for his rice crop production.

loans.use: to buy seeds and other farm inputs needed in his rice farming business.

loans.name: Nilo

texts.en:
Farming rice is a common source of income for residents of San Miguel, Bohol. Nilo, 38, is relying on the same livelihood.

Nilo is struggling to keep his farming business and so he is asking for a loan to buy five sacks of fertilizer, pesticides, and insecticides to keep his crops from getting diseases. His main goal is to earn a higher income from his business. The additional revenue will go towards his family's daily consumption and his three children's education. In the future, Nilo hopes to successfully send his children to college until they graduate.

loans.use: to buy five sacks of fertilizer, pesticides, and insecticides.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 57 years old and a farmer from the community of San Miguel, Bohol. She has a son who is already an adult. She plants and harvests rice crops, which she sells to the market. Rebecca shared how tedious work at the farm can be. She said she has been able to provide for her family's needs because of her rice farm.

Rebecca is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer for her farm to keep her crops robust and healthy. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from her business to save and improve her business profitability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Rufa

texts.en: Rufa is a 46-year-old woman with five school-age children, ages 3-15. She is working hard in three small businesses: raising hogs, cooking snacks to sell, and farming rice. As she provides for her family, she also needs additional capital to make her business successful. She will use the loan requested to buy feed and additional piglets to raise to maximize her profit for her family. Her income will keep her children in school and allow them to have nutritious meals.

loans.use: to buy feed and additional piglets

loans.name: Muhammadjon

texts.ru: Эта парень Мухаммадчон. Он из района Муминабод. Мухаммадчон семейный парень. У него трое детей. Мухаммадчон живет вместе с матерью, братом, сестренкой, братишкой, женой и племянниками. Его брат работает в городе Душанбе. Мама занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельности. Жена Мухаммадчона занимается шитьем женской одежды на заказ. У него в семье все имеет свою работу, и его семья очень дружная. Мухаммадxон молодой таксист. Он перевозить людей уже 4 года. Мухаммадxон занимается в районе. Путем автомашины он зарабатывает на жизнь. У него имеется автомашина марки «Daewoo Leganza». Мухаммадчон хочет отремонтировать машину и продвигать работу. Для купли автозапчасти и ремонт машины у него не хватает денежных средств. Поэтому он просит Вас поддержать его.
texts.en:
Meet Muhammadjon, a young man from the Muminobod district of Tajikistan and the father of three children.  Muhammadjon lives with his mother, his brothers, younger sister, his wife and nephews.  His brother works in Dushanbe.  His mother is involved in agriculture.  His wife is an independent seamstress who sews traditional Tajik dresses for women.  Everyone has his/her own job and the family is very close-knit.

Muhammadjon works as a taxi driver in his own district.  He has been transporting passengers around for four years already.  He makes a living thanks to his car, a "Daewoo Leganza".  Muhammadjon wants to repair his car and keep on working.  However, he doesn't have enough money to buy spare parts and to pay for the repairs.  For this reason, he's asking you to support him.

loans.use: to buy auto spare parts and pay the mechanic's labor.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.en:
In the town of San Miguel most people are blessed with ample land to cultivate and grow their crops. Macaria has been rice farming here on her land for more than twenty years. She works to provide for the school needs of her two children aged ten and twelve.

Macaria has applied for a 24,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner CEVI to buy fertilizer and pesticides to keep her farm flourishing in anticipation of a better harvest in four months. Her profits will help her family pay for its daily needs and school expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her rice fields.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is a married woman with four dependent children. She lives in Salaga, Accra. She resells used clothes. She stocks up once a month at the market and resells in a warehouse located on the side of the road.

Monica is taking out this loan in order to have a large stock of merchandise and to maximize her profits. She will buy children's and adults' used clothes. She hopes to increase her sales and meet her customers' many needs. Thanks to this loan, she will be able to make some profits and to take care of her children's education.

loans.use: to buy children's and adults' used clothes to increase her sales and meet her customers' many needs.

loans.name: Philomenah

texts.en: Philomenah is 56 years old, married and blessed with five children. She sells ladies shoes, handbags, clothing materials and blankets. She has been in this business for the last 25 years, earning a monthly income of 30,000 Kenyan shillings. This is her second loan with VisionFund Kenya, and she plans to purchase shoes, handbags, clothing materials, and blankets to sell to her customers. The anticipated profits shall be used to pay back the loan and save for higher borrowing in the future.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, handbags, clothing materials, and blankets to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is a 38-year-old married woman who is blessed with three children aged between 8 and 16.

She has been in the clothes selling business for eight years and earns a monthly income of Kshs 22,000.

This is her third loan with VisionFund Kenya.  She intends to buy more clothes for ladies and children to retail in the village.

With the anticipated profits she will be able to help her husband and pay school fees for their children.

Her dream is to become financially stable.

loans.use: to buy more ladies and children's clothes for retail

loans.name: Kabazi Group

texts.fr: C'est depuis 18 ans que François et sa famille cultive la tomate. Ils ont acquis cette expérience quand ils étaient dans un camp de refuge en Tanzanie. Pour la dernière expérience, la famille a capitalisé quatre cents dollars après les charges. François se plaint de l'absence d'eau et des maladies incurables; toutefois, ils souhaiteraient qu'à la récolte que leur étendue arable soit élargie afin d'augmenter la production pour le bien-être de la famille.
texts.en: François and his family have been growing tomatoes for the past 18 years.  They acquired their experience when they were in a refugee camp in Tanzania.  The family has recently been able to save 400 USD, after expenses.  François complains about incurable diseases and the paucity of water.  However, he is still hoping to increase the size of his arable land after the coming harvest.  His goal is to  increase his yield and improve the well-being of his family.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, weeding and transplanting costs, and also to buy fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Yessica Carolina

texts.es:
Yessica, se dedica a crianza de pollos de engorde, así como también a la crianza de gallinas ponedoras, ella vive con su esposo y ambos se dedican a esta actividad; Yessica inicio hace 8 meses con el proyecto y es su esposo es el que cuenta con una mayor experiencia en el tema y es quien le está ayudando a ejecutar el proyecto el cual hasta la fecha les marcha muy bien.
Con el otorgamiento del crédito ella lo invertirá en la compra de 200 pollos de engorde además 100 gallinas ponedoras, esto le ayudara a mejorar el inventario de su negocio, ya que le permitirá poder ampliar la producción.
El sueño de Yessica es poder tener una granja más grande, para poder mejorar los ingresos económicos, por ende esto le permitirá poder tener una mejor calidad de vida ella y su núcleo familiar.
texts.en: Yessica works raising chickens for fattening, as well as raising laying hens. She lives with her husband and both of them work in this activity. Yessica started this project  8 months ago,  and her husband is the one with more experience in the field  who is helping her develop the project up to now which is going very well. With this loan she will buy 200 broaster chickens and 100 laying hens, which will help her improve the inventory in her business, and will allow her to expand production. Yessica's dream is to have a bigger farm, to help hem improve her earnings, thus will allow her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: To buy 200 broiler chickens and 100 laying hens, to improve the invetory in her business.

loans.name: Roxana De Jesús

texts.es:
Roxana, de 32 años de edad, no asistió a la escuela, está acompañada, tiene 3 hijos que asistente a la escuela,

Roxana, se dedica a los oficios domésticos y vende comida típica en la cancha de la comunidad y entre los vecinos, ella preparar los productos y los vende 4 días a la semana.

Roxana, necesita el préstamo para comprar papas, yuca, aceite, sal, verduras, entre otros productos más, para mejorar su negocio, porque en temporada navideña las ventas incrementan.

Roxana, sueña con colocar una pupuseria y mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Roxana is 32 years old, did not attend school, is married, and has three kids who go to school. Roxana works as a housekeeper and sells traditional food in her neighborhood, preparing food for neighbors to sell 4 days a week. Roxana needs the loan to purchase potatoes, yuca, olive oil, salt, and vegetables, among other products to improve her business because during the Christmas season sales increase. Roxana dreams of having a shop to sell pupusas (stuffed tortillas) and improving her home.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes, yuca, olive oil, salt, vegetables, among other products to improve her business.

loans.name: Jentrix's Group

texts.en:
Jentrix is 50 years old and has nine children. She has been a farmer for 16 years and is always said to be a very hardworking individual. Even though Jentrix is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group formed by 14 farmers in Teso District, Kenya.

Jentrix started working alongside One Acre Fund in 2011 and decided to do so because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since then, she has seen her life improve, especially in the sense that she has had more profits from each harvest ever since. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers.

Jentrix’s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 6.75 acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing solar lights. Therefore, with this loan, the group will receive a total of six solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming growing season.

loans.name: Jose Darwin

texts.es:
Darwin, de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, tiene 27 años, está soltero, pero ayuda económicamente a su mamá.

Darwin, trabaja en la agricultura desde muy pequeño, junto a su padre y hermano; pero aparte de eso también aprendió a reparar llantas de vehículos y a través de este oficio genera ingresos extras.

Darwin, necesita el préstamo para comprar un compresor y herramientas para colocar un taller de reparación de llantas.

Darwin, sueña con tener su propio negocio y ser independiente.
texts.en: Darwin is 27 years old. He studied up to eight grade. He is 27 years old, single, and he helps her mom financially. Darwin works in agriculture since very young, along with his father and brother. In addition, he also learned to repair car tires and through this business he generates more income. Darwin needs the loan to buy a compressor and tools to start a tire repair shop. Darwin dreams of having his own business and be independent.

loans.use: To buy a compressor and tools to begin a tire repair shop.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 23 years old, and she is married with one child.

She has had a retail shop business for five years. She will be using the loan to purchase a motorcycle and start a transportation business hoping that this will enable her to earn more income to expand her business and support her family.

She will use her anticipated profits to repay her loan, pay school fees for her child, and to buy more retail goods.

Her hopes and dreams for the future are to improve her businesses, have a better house structure, and to live a happy life with her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle and start a transportation business hoping that this will enable her to earn more income to expand her business and support her family.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael is a 33-year-old man from Kisumu; he is married and supporting six people in his family.

He operates a motorcycle transportation business, which he has been doing for the last three years making a monthly income of KES 30,000.

He has applied for his second loan with VisionFund Kenya, which he will use to purchase a new tracker to help him secure his motorcycle from theft.

loans.use: to purchase a new tracker to help him secure his motorcycle from theft.

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
Samson is 47 years old. He is married with 2 children.

He has had a shoe sale business for 4 years. He will be using the loan to buy new shoes for him to sell. He will also buy shoe soles to use to repair old shoes for his customers.

He will use the anticipated profit to repay his loan and to buy clothes for his children. 

His hopes and dreams for the future are to live a successful life together with his family.

loans.use: to buy shoes and shoe soles for resale

loans.name: St. Lawrence Horizon School

texts.en:
Greetings from Uganda! This is Rose. She is the head teacher of St. Lawrence Horizon Campus, a mixed school in the urban area of Nabingo in Wakiso with 700 students. St. Lawrence Horizon Campus has requested a loan to cover the cost of installing and maintaining a UV water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for the students. The school does not currently have access to consistent clean drinking water and therefore has to spend a considerable portion of its budget on firewood, which is used to boil water for the children. Installing a water filtration system will therefore save the school money in the long term as the cost of firewood will be reduced. The loan will enable the school to purchase a UV water treatment system with a 750 litre tank, which will be big enough to store clean drinking water for the students every day.

St. Lawrence Horizon Campus will repay their loan from their school fees, which they collect each term. Rose ultimately hopes that having access to safe drinking water will improve her students' concentration and attendance by reducing the number of children that fall sick from waterborne diseases as well as increase the number of students coming to the school.

loans.use: to purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for the students.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is a 35-year-old motorcycle spare parts dealer at Voi Kenya. He is a father of four children and has been doing well in this business for the last six years.

This is his third loan from VisionFund Kenya to finance his business. He will use the loan to purchase spare motorcycle parts and the anticipated profit to educate his children and repay his loan. He hopes to own several motorcycle spare parts shops in future.

loans.use: to purchase spare motorcycle parts for resale

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is 41 years old. She is married with four children.

Joyce has had a grocery business for 12 years. She will be using the loan to purchase vegetables such as tomatoes, cabbages, and kale to sell to her clients and hopes that this will help her to pay school fees.

Joyce's hopes and dreams for the future are to educate her children to university level.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables such as tomatoes, cabbages, and kale to sell to her clients.

loans.name: Joselyne's Group

texts.en:
Joselyne, pictured above, has seven children and is always described as a very experienced farmer, which is why she was selected to become the group leader of her group. Joselyne is representing her group of ten farmers in Teso District and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

Joselyne has been a farmer for ten years, and in order to make more farmer friends in her community, she decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. Her loan will not only include farming inputs, but also a solar light, which she is very happy to be getting as that means she will now have light during dark hours so that her children will be able to study. With the profits from this coming season, Joselyne is planning to send her children to school.

A total of 6.5 acres will be planted by Joselyne's Group, and between them, they will receive a total of six solar lights.

loans.use: to gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation, and to purchase a solar light.

loans.name: Jiguiya Group

texts.fr:
Marke est l’homme qui tient la corde du bœuf en main. C’est un embaucheur Malien, non scolarisé. Il est âgé de quarante-huit (48 Ans), père de huit (08) enfants tous scolarisés et sont âgés de quatorze(14) à vingt-sept (27) ans. Sa femme vent des galettes.
Depuis 2012 il a fait recourt au RMCR pour progresser son embouche bovine. Il fait ses achats dans les différents marchés de sa zone et fait ses ventes dans les zones voisines. Marke fait l’embouche des bovins depuis plus de vingt (20) ans. Grâce à son bénéfice mensuel  estimé à Quarante-cinq mille francs (45 000f CFA) il parvient à subvenir aux besoins de la famille (frais de scolarité, médicaux, nourritures de ses enfants).
texts.en: Marke is the man who has the ox rope in his hand. From Mali, he works in the fattening of cattle and is un-educated. He is forty-eight years old (48 years), father of eight (8) children all of whom are in school and aged from fourteen (14) to twenty-seven (27) years. His wife sells galettes. Since 2012, he has appealed to the RMCR in order to advance his cattle fattening. He goes shopping at different markets in the area and goes to sell in surrounding areas. Marke has been working in cattle fattening for more than twenty (20) years. Thanks to his monthly profits valued at Fourty-five thousand francs (45,000f CFA), he manages to meet his family's needs (cost of schooling, medicine, his children's food).

loans.use: to buy ox to be sold.

loans.name: Jekafo Group

texts.fr:
Sitan est la femme qui tient la corne du bélier en main. C’est une ménagère Malienne, non scolarisé. Elle est âgée de 53 Ans. Mère de 03 enfants tous scolarisés âgé de 12 à 27ans. Son mari est cultivateur.
Depuis 2012 elle a fait recours au RMCR pour progresser son embouche ovine. Elle fait ses achats dans les différents marchés de sa zone et revend dans les zones voisines. Grâce à son bénéfice mensuel  estimé à 30 000f CFA elle parvient à  aider son mari à subvenir aux besoins de la famille tels que (frais de scolarité, médicaux, nourritures de ses enfants).
texts.en: Sitan is the woman holding the rope of the ram in her hand. She is a Malian housewife, non-educated. She is 53 years old. She is a mother of 3 children, all of whom are in school, aged between 12 to 27 years old. Her husband is a farmer. Since 2012, she has appealed to RMCR in order to advance her fattening of sheep. She goes shopping at different markets in the area and goes to re-sell in the surrounding areas. Thanks to her monthly profit valued at 30 000f CFA she manages to help her husband to meet her family's needs such as (school fees, medicine and food for her children).

loans.use: to buy, feed and sell sheep.

loans.name: Bunavsha

texts.en: Bunavsha was born in 1978. She is a hardworking and smart woman. Bunavsha is a married parent of three children. Her husband is a driver. Bunavsha, for more than four years, has been busy with her business. She sells children's clothes in a local market. Bunavsha, little by little with the passing of the time. has improved her business and developed her skills. She periodically renews the assortment of her goods and that’s why she is asking for a loan of 7,000 Somoni to buy children's clothes for the new season. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy children's clothes for the new season

loans.name: Mher

texts.en: Mher is 38 years old and he lives in Sevan city in the Gegharkunik region. Mher is married and he has a nice daughter. His wife is a saleswoman at the food market. Mher works at a private workshop as a leading specialist. Thanks to Mher and his wife’s savings during the autumn season, they managed to do some repairs to his flat, making it very nice and cuter than before. Now he asks for this loan of 690.000 Armenian drams, as he also wants to furnish his flat. He will buy guestroom furniture with this loan, making it comfortable and attractive for his family and guests as well.

loans.use: to buy guestroom furniture, making it comfortable and attractive for his family and guests as well

loans.name: Murman

texts.en:
Murman is 29 years old. He is married and lives in Batumi district with his wife and pensioner parents.

Murman wants to renovate a flat and rent it out and requested a loan. The startup program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 3,000 USD. With the received credit he will renovate a flat and will rent it out. This will give him a stable income, and Murman will be able to cover everyday expenses. Murman awaits your support.

loans.use: to renovate a house and rent it out in order to get stable income.

loans.name: Oktay

texts.en: Oktay is a taxi driver. He is an Internally Displaced Person (IDP) from the region of Fuzuli, but he is now settled in Baku city with his family. Oktay has a car and for four years he has been a taxi driver. Oktay transports passengers between different areas of Baku region and he loves his job.   Today, the tires of his car are outdated and Oktay wants to change them. He has applied to Komak company. Today he needs his third loan in the amount of  1700 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). With this loan, he wants to buy snow tires for his taxi. Oktay is thankful to Kiva and lenders for the help.

loans.use: to buy snow tires for his taxi

loans.name: Shaheen

texts.en:
Shaheen is 41 years old, a married woman and a mother of six children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality.

With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business; currently she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales and earn profits for providing her family with the basic necessities of life. Shaheen aspires to further expand her business and increase the number of animals she at present owns.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales and earn profits for providing her family with the basic necessities of life.

loans.name: Shahneel

texts.en:
Some years back Shahneel was hardly managing her household activities with the small income of her husband. Then through loans from Kasha Foundation, she initiated her business of hand embroidery.

Shahneel is 28 years old and a married woman. She has three children. Shahneel is very skilled in the art of hand embroidery and has been using this skill for many years to earn a living. She can make beautiful designs and patterns with her hand. Her skill is known throughout the town.

She has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. This loan will enable her to purchase more beads, threads, and frames to meet orders of her customers on time to earn a good amount of profits. This monetary help can take Shahneel closer to her dream of providing quality education to her children.
